subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: In his first training camp as the team’s coach, Brent Sutter has attempted to implement a new style with which the Devils can thrive and escape their dungeon of dreary, defense-first play.
snippet: In his first training camp as the team’s coach, Brent Sutter has attempted to implement a new style with which the Devils can thrive and escape their dungeon of dreary, defense-first play.
